channel.title: Closing Runserver question
channel.description: Ok, it hasnt done this until yesterday when i was trying to add a server auto restarter but now when i close runserver.bat or perfect compiler it says that the port is still in use when i try to re open it again. and it doesnt log anyone out and i have to keep restarting computer. How do I fix this.

item.title: Closing Runserver question
item.dc:creator: @xsaberjrx xsaberjrx
item.description:
@xsaberjrx wrote:

Ok, it hasnt done this until yesterday when i was trying to add a server auto restarter but now when i close runserver.bat or perfect compiler it says that the port is still in use when i try to re open it again. and it doesnt log anyone out and i have to keep restarting computer. How do I fix this.

Read full topic
